description: VersionAvailability gives information about the synchronization and operational status of a particular version of the component

errors.description: errors indicates what failures are associated with the operator trying to manage this version

generations.description: generations allows an operator to track what the generation of "important" resources was the last time we updated them

items.description: GenerationHistory keeps track of the generation for a given resource so that decisions about forced updated can be made.

group.description: group is the group of the thing you're tracking

lastGeneration.description: lastGeneration is the last generation of the workload controller involved

name.description: name is the name of the thing you're tracking

namespace.description: namespace is where the thing you're tracking is

resource.description: resource is the resource type of the thing you're tracking

readyReplicas.description: readyReplicas indicates how many replicas are ready and at the desired state

updatedReplicas.description: updatedReplicas indicates how many replicas are at the desired state

version.description: version is the level this availability applies to
